sentences.en: clam chowder (= a type of soup )
Everybody shuts up like a clam as soon as you mention it.
sentences.cn: 你一提及此事,大家便都闭口不言.

sentences.en: He is now as happy as a clam.
I picked plenty of colorful clam shells along the seaside.
sentences.cn: 我在海边捡了好多彩色蚌壳.

sentences.en: It'started off well, but he seemed to clam up towards the end.
sentences.cn: 刚开始进行得很好，但是最后他似乎有些沉默。

sentences.en: Normally chatty Mckinsey partners clam up when asked about the race.
sentences.cn: 平时喋喋不休的麦肯锡合伙人在被问及这场“赛马”的时候三缄其口.

sentences.en: People and cars go back the busy streets, clam as the reality.
sentences.cn: 街道上人来人往, 车水马龙,现实就是这样的平静.

sentences.en: She would make clam chowder every Sunday night, clam chowder and combread.
sentences.cn: 她每个星期天都做蛤肉杂烩, 蛤肉杂烩和玉米饼.

sentences.en: The barnacle and the clam are two examples of filter feeders.
sentences.cn: 藤壶和蛤类是滤过觅食者的两种例子.

sentences.en: The movie star is a clam about her age.
sentences.cn: 这影星对她的年龄守口如瓶.

sentences.en: Today we have chicken noodle, tomato and clam chowder.
sentences.cn: 女招待:今天有鸡面 、 蕃茄、杂烩汤.

sentences.en: Whenever Bev walked by, Roy got so nervous he would just clam up.
sentences.cn: 每当Bev走过时, Roy总是紧张得说不出话来.

sentences.en: Will you clam up! The boss is talking.
sentences.cn: 请你保持安静! 老板在说话.

sentences.en: You can't talk with those peasants. They can clam up as well as the Foreign Office.
sentences.cn: 你不能跟那些农民谈话. 他们象外交部一样,可能一点口气也不漏.

sentences.en: You should not clam up on him.
sentences.cn: 你不应该拒绝跟他谈话.

words.tran_cn: [无脊椎]蛤；沉默寡言的人；钳子

trans.tran_cn: 蚌，蛤，〈美口〉沉默寡言的人，钳子，〈美俚〉银币
trans.tran_en: a  shellfish  you can eat that has a shell in two parts that open up

trans.tran_cn: 捞蛤；保持沉默，闭嘴不言
